# HOT / COLD Microphone Swapper - by Njna_Grimsdottir

## Description
This one is to switch between a 'hot mic (unfiltered)' and a 'cold mic' with noise cancelling and such.

## Installation

Copy the text from the code box below into the `Import` box in Streamer.bot to add these to your action library:

```

```

## Configuration

Just make two audio inputs, one with your normal filters and one wide open.. point the two actions at them.  I use this primarily when I want to sing or do something 'loud' on stream that the typical filters I use for dancing and gaming to hide heavy breathing and such would mask out.
